title: Mechanically interlocked calix[4]arene dimers display reversible bond breakage under force
title_cn: 机械互锁的杯[4]芳烃二聚体在力作用下显示可逆键断裂
abstract: The physics of nanoscopic systems is strongly governed by thermal fluctuations that produce significant deviations from the behaviour of large ensembles. Stretching experiments of single molecules offer a unique way to study fundamental theories of statistical mechanics, as recently shown for the unzipping of RNA hairpins. Here, we report a molecular design based on oligo calix[4]arene catenanes—calixarene dimers held together by 16 hydrogen bridges—in which loops within the molecules limit how far the calixarene nanocapsules can be separated. This mechanically locked structure tunes the energy landscape of dimers, thus permitting the reversible rupture and rejoining of the individual nanocapsules. Experimental evidence, supported by molecular dynamics simulations, reveals the presence of an intermediate state involving the concerted rupture of the 16 hydrogen bridges. Stochastic modelling using a three-well potential under external load allows reconstruction of the energy landscape.
abstract_cn: 纳米系统的物理性质受到热波动的强烈支配，而热波动会导致与大集合体的行为产生重大偏差。单分子拉伸实验提供了一种独特的方法来研究统计力学的基本理论，如最近对RNA发夹的解压缩所示。在这里，我们报告了一种基于寡聚杯[4]芳烃链的分子设计，该分子由16个氢桥保持在一起，其中分子内的环圈限制了杯芳烃纳米胶囊的分离距离。这种机械锁定的结构可以调节二聚体的能量分布，从而允许各个纳米胶囊的可逆破裂和重新结合。在分子动力学模拟的支持下，实验证据表明存在一个中间状态，该状态涉及16个氢桥的协同断裂。在外部载荷下使用三阱势的随机建模可以重建能量格局。

title: Mechanically controlled binary conductance switching of a single-molecule junction
title_cn: 机械控制的单分子结的二进制电导切换
abstract: Molecular-scale components are expected to be central to the realization of nanoscale electronic devices. Although molecular-scale switching has been reported in atomic quantum point contacts, single-molecule junctions provide the additional flexibility of tuning the on/off conductance states through molecular design. To date, switching in single-molecule junctions has been attributed to changes in the conformation or charge state of the molecule. Here, we demonstrate reversible binary switching in a single-molecule junction by mechanical control of the metal–molecule contact geometry. We show that 4,4'-bipyridine–gold single-molecule junctions can be reversibly switched between two conductance states through repeated junction elongation and compression. Using first-principles calculations, we attribute the different measured conductance states to distinct contact geometries at the flexible but stable nitrogen–gold bond: conductance is low when the N–Au bond is perpendicular to the conducting π-system, and high otherwise. This switching mechanism, inherent to the pyridine–gold link, could form the basis of a new class of mechanically activated single-molecule switches.
abstract_cn: 预计分子级组件将成为实现纳米级电子设备的关键。尽管已经报道了原子量子点接触中的分子尺度转换，但是单分子结提供了额外的灵活性，可以通过分子设计来调节开/关电导状态。迄今为止，单分子连接中的转换已归因于分子的构象或电荷状态的变化。在这里，我们通过机械控制金属分子的接触几何来展示单分子结中的可逆二进制开关。我们显示4,4'-联吡啶＆＃8211;金单分子结可以通过重复的结伸长和压缩在两个电导状态之间可逆地切换。使用第一性原理计算，我们将不同的测量电导状态归因于在柔性但稳定的氮金键上不同的接触几何形状：当N金键与导电垂直时，电导率较低。系统，否则为高。吡啶金链固有的这种开关机制可以构成一类新型的机械激活单分子开关的基础。</ p>

title: On-chip cooling by superlattice-based thin-film thermoelectrics
title_cn: 基于超晶格的薄膜热电器件进行片上冷却
abstract: There is a significant need for site-specific and on-demand cooling in electronic, optoelectronic and bioanalytical devices, where cooling is currently achieved by the use of bulky and/or over-designed system-level solutions. Thermoelectric devices can address these limitations while also enabling energy-efficient solutions, and significant progress has been made in the development of nanostructured thermoelectric materials with enhanced figures-of-merit. However, fully functional practical thermoelectric coolers have not been made from these nanomaterials due to the enormous difficulties in integrating nanoscale materials into microscale devices and packaged macroscale systems. Here, we show the integration of thermoelectric coolers fabricated from nanostructured Bi2Te3-based thin-film superlattices into state-of-the-art electronic packages. We report cooling of as much as 15 °C at the targeted region on a silicon chip with a high (∼1,300 W cm−2) heat flux. This is the first demonstration of viable chip-scale refrigeration technology and has the potential to enable a wide range of currently thermally limited applications.
abstract_cn: 迫切需要电子，光电和生物分析设备中的特定地点和按需冷却，目前这些冷却是通过使用体积大和/或设计过度的系统级解决方案来实现的。热电器件可以解决这些局限性，同时还可以提供节能解决方案，并且在具有改进的品质因数的纳米结构热电材料的开发方面已经取得了重大进展。然而，由于将纳米级材料集成到微尺度器件和封装的宏观尺度系统中的巨大困难，尚未由这些纳米材料制成功能齐全的实用热电冷却器。在这里，我们展示了由基于纳米结构的Bi 2 Te 3 薄膜超晶格制成的热电冷却器集成到最新的电子封装中的过程。我们报告说，在具有高（＆＃8764; 1,300 W cm ＆＃8722; 2 ）热通量的硅芯片上，目标区域的冷却温度高达15°C。这是可行的芯片级制冷技术的首次展示，并且有潜力实现目前受热限制的各种应用。

title: Bottom-up growth of fully transparent contact layers of indium tin oxide nanowires for light-emitting devices
title_cn: 自底向上生长用于发光器件的铟锡氧化物纳米线的完全透明的接触层
abstract: Thin layers of indium tin oxide are widely used as transparent coatings and electrodes in solar energy cells, flat-panel displays, antireflection coatings, radiation protection and lithium-ion battery materials, because they have the characteristics of low resistivity, strong absorption at ultraviolet wavelengths, high transmission in the visible, high reflectivity in the far-infrared and strong attenuation in the microwave region. However, there is often a trade-off between electrical conductivity and transparency at visible wavelengths for indium tin oxide and other transparent conducting oxides. Here, we report the growth of layers of indium tin oxide nanowires that show optimum electronic and photonic properties and demonstrate their use as fully transparent top contacts in the visible to near-infrared region for light-emitting devices.
abstract_cn: 氧化铟锡薄层由于具有电阻率低，吸收性强的特点，被广泛用作太阳能电池，平板显示器，抗反射涂层，辐射防护和锂离子电池材料的透明涂层和电极。 在紫外波长下，可见光的透射率高，远红外光的反射率高，微波区域的衰减大。 然而，对于铟锡氧化物和其他透明导电氧化物，通常在可见光波长下的电导率和透明性之间需要权衡。 在这里，我们报道了具有最佳电子和光子性能的氧化铟锡纳米线层的生长情况，并证明了它们在可见光到近红外区域中用作发光器件的完全透明的顶部触点的用途。

title: Dynamic patterning programmed by DNA tiles captured on a DNA origami substrate
title_cn: 由DNA折纸底物上捕获的DNA磁片编程的动态图案
abstract: The aim of nanotechnology is to put specific atomic and molecular species where we want them, when we want them there. Achieving such dynamic and functional control could lead to programmable chemical synthesis and nanoscale systems that are responsive to their environments. Structural DNA nanotechnology offers a powerful route to this goal by combining stable branched DNA motifs with cohesive ends to produce programmed nanomechanical devices and fixed or modified patterned lattices. Here, we demonstrate a dynamic form of patterning in which a pattern component is captured between two independently programmed DNA devices. A simple and robust error-correction protocol has been developed that yields programmed targets in all cases. This capture system can lead to dynamic control either on patterns or on programmed elements; this capability enables computation or a change of structural state as a function of information in the surroundings of the system.
abstract_cn: 纳米技术的目的是将特定的原子和分子种类放到我们想要的地方。 实现这种动态和功能控制可能会导致对环境进行响应的可编程化学合成和纳米级系统。 结构性DNA纳米技术通过将稳定的支链DNA图案与具有粘性的末端相结合，以产生程序化的纳米机械设备以及固定或修饰的图案化格子，为实现这一目标提供了一条有力的途径。 在这里，我们演示了一种动态的图案形成方式，其中在两个独立编程的DNA设备之间捕获了图案成分。 已经开发了一种简单而强大的错误校正协议，该协议可以在所有情况下产生编程目标。 该捕获系统可以导致对图案或已编程元素的动态控制。 此功能可以根据系统周围的信息进行计算或改变结构状态。

title: Enzyme cascades activated on topologically programmed DNA scaffolds
title_cn: 在拓扑编程的DNA支架上激活的酶级联反应
abstract: The ability of DNA to self-assemble into one-, two- and three-dimensional nanostructures, combined with the precision that is now possible when positioning nanoparticles or proteins on DNA scaffolds, provide a promising approach for the self-organization of composite nanostructures. Predicting and controlling the functions that emerge in self-organized biomolecular nanostructures is a major challenge in systems biology, and although a number of innovative examples have been reported, the emergent properties of systems in which enzymes are coupled together have not been fully explored. Here, we report the self-assembly of a DNA scaffold made of DNA strips that include ‘hinges’ to which biomolecules can be tethered. We attach either two enzymes or a cofactor–enzyme pair to the scaffold, and show that enzyme cascades or cofactor-mediated biocatalysis can proceed effectively; similar processes are not observed in diffusion-controlled homogeneous mixtures of the same components. Furthermore, because the relative position of the two enzymes or the cofactor–enzyme pair is determined by the topology of the DNA scaffold, it is possible to control the reactivity of the system through the design of the individual DNA strips. This method could lead to the self-organization of complex multi-enzyme cascades.
abstract_cn: DNA自组装为一维，二维和三维纳米结构的能力，再加上现在将纳米颗粒或蛋白质置于DNA支架上时所能达到的精度，为DNA的自组织提供了一种有前途的方法复合纳米结构。预测和控制在自组织的生物分子纳米结构中出现的功能是系统生物学中的主要挑战，尽管已经报道了许多创新的例子，但尚未充分探索其中酶偶联在一起的系统的新兴特性。在这里，我们报告了由DNA条带制成的DNA支架的自组装，DNA条带包括＆＃8216;铰链＆＃8217;可以将生物分子束缚到其上。我们将两种酶或辅因子酶对连接到支架上，并表明酶级联或辅因子介导的生物催化可以有效地进行。在相同组分的扩散控制的均质混合物中未观察到类似的过程。此外，因为两种酶或辅因子酶对的相对位置由DNA支架的拓扑结构决定，所以可以通过设计各个DNA条带来控制系统的反应性。该方法可能导致复杂的多酶级联反应的自组织。

title: Real-time monitoring of enzyme activity in a mesoporous silicon double layer
title_cn: 实时监测介孔硅双层中酶的活性
abstract: The activity of certain proteolytic enzymes is often an indicator of disease states such as cancer, stroke and neurodegeneracy, so there is a need for rapid assays that can characterize the kinetics and substrate specificity of enzymatic reactions. Nanostructured membranes can efficiently separate biomolecules, but coupling a sensitive detection method to such a membrane remains difficult. Here, we demonstrate a single mesoporous nanoreactor that can isolate and quantify in real time the reaction products of proteases. The reactor consists of two layers of porous films electrochemically prepared from crystalline silicon. The upper layer, with large pore sizes (∼100 nm in diameter), traps the protease and acts as the reactor. The lower layer, with smaller pore sizes (∼6 nm), excludes the proteases and other large proteins and captures the reaction products. Infiltration of the digested fragments into the lower layer produces a measurable change in optical reflectivity, and this allows label-free quantification of enzyme kinetics in real time within a volume of ∼5 nl.
abstract_cn: 某些蛋白水解酶的活性通常是疾病状态（例如癌症，中风和神经退行性疾病）的指标，因此需要一种能够表征酶促反应动力学和底物特异性的快速检测方法。纳米结构的膜可以有效地分离生物分子，但是将灵敏的检测方法耦合到这种膜上仍然很困难。在这里，我们展示了一个单一的介孔纳米反应器，可以实时分离和定量蛋白酶的反应产物。反应器由两层由结晶硅电化学制备的多孔膜组成。具有大孔径（直径为100纳米）的上层捕获蛋白酶并充当反应器。具有较小孔径（＆＃8764; 6 nm）的下层不包括蛋白酶和其他大蛋白，并捕获反应产物。消化后的片段渗入下层会产生可测量的光反射率变化，从而可以在5nl的体积内实时进行无标记的酶动力学定量。</ p>

title: A highly sensitive and selective diagnostic assay based on virus nanoparticles
title_cn: 基于病毒纳米颗粒的高灵敏度和选择性诊断测定
abstract: Early detection of the protein marker troponin I in patients with a higher risk of acute myocardial infarction can reduce the risk of death from heart attacks. Most troponin assays are currently based on the conventional enzyme linked immunosorbent assay and have detection limits in the nano- and picomolar range. Here, we show that by combining viral nanoparticles, which are engineered to have dual affinity for troponin antibodies and nickel, with three-dimensional nanostructures including nickel nanohairs, we can detect troponin levels in human serum samples that are six to seven orders of magnitude lower than those detectable using conventional enzyme linked immunosorbent assays. The viral nanoparticle helps to orient the antibodies for maximum capture of the troponin markers. High densities of antibodies on the surfaces of the nanoparticles and nanohairs lead to greater binding of the troponin markers, which significantly enhances detection sensitivities. The nickel nanohairs are re-useable and can reproducibly differentiate healthy serum from unhealthy ones. We expect other viral nanoparticles to form similar highly sensitive diagnostic assays for a variety of other protein markers.
abstract_cn: 在急性心肌梗死风险较高的患者中早期检测蛋白标志物肌钙蛋白I可以降低心脏病发作致死的风险。目前大多数肌钙蛋白测定均基于常规的酶联免疫吸附测定，并且检测限在纳米和皮摩尔范围内。在这里，我们表明，通过结合对肌钙蛋白抗体和镍具有双重亲和力的病毒纳米颗粒与包括镍纳米毛的三维纳米结构相结合，我们可以检测到人类血清样品中肌钙蛋白水平降低了六到七个数量级。比使用常规酶联免疫吸附测定法可检测到的结果要高。病毒纳米颗粒有助于定向抗体，以最大程度地捕获肌钙蛋白标志物。纳米颗粒和纳米毛表面上抗体的高密度导致肌钙蛋白标记物的结合更大，从而显着提高检测灵敏度。镍纳米毛是可重复使用的，可以将健康血清与不健康血清区别开来。我们希望其他病毒纳米颗粒能够对多种其他蛋白质标记物形成类似的高度敏感的诊断分析。

title: Continuous base identification for single-molecule nanopore DNA sequencing
title_cn: 连续碱基鉴定用于单分子纳米孔DNA测序
abstract: A single-molecule method for sequencing DNA that does not require fluorescent labelling could reduce costs and increase sequencing speeds. An exonuclease enzyme might be used to cleave individual nucleotide molecules from the DNA, and when coupled to an appropriate detection system, these nucleotides could be identified in the correct order. Here, we show that a protein nanopore with a covalently attached adapter molecule can continuously identify unlabelled nucleoside 5'-monophosphate molecules with accuracies averaging 99.8%. Methylated cytosine can also be distinguished from the four standard DNA bases: guanine, adenine, thymine and cytosine. The operating conditions are compatible with the exonuclease, and the kinetic data show that the nucleotides have a high probability of translocation through the nanopore and, therefore, of not being registered twice. This highly accurate tool is suitable for integration into a system for sequencing nucleic acids and for analysing epigenetic modifications.
abstract_cn: 不需要荧光标记的单分子DNA测序方法可以降低成本并提高测序速度。核酸外切酶可用于从DNA切割单个核苷酸分子，并且当与适当的检测系统偶联时，可以以正确的顺序识别这些核苷酸。在这里，我们显示了具有共价连接的衔接子分子的蛋白质纳米孔可以连续鉴定平均精度为99.8％的未标记核苷5'-单磷酸分子。甲基化的胞嘧啶也可以与四种标准DNA碱基区分开：鸟嘌呤，腺嘌呤，胸腺嘧啶和胞嘧啶。操作条件与核酸外切酶相容，并且动力学数据表明核苷酸具有通过纳米孔易位的可能性，因此不会被两次注册。这种高度精确的工具适合集成到用于核酸测序和分析表观遗传修饰的系统中。
